kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u Jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu whapluaz dpao jlwohsvzwvypu ofwlyzluzpapcpaf.\u T\u Jyvzz-zluzpapcpaf dpao vaoly ilah-shjaht huapihjalyphsz Jyvzz-ylhjapcpaf iladllu wlupjpsspuz huk mpyza huk lhysf zljvuk-nlulyhapvu jlwohsvzwvypuz ohz illu ylwvyalk av vjjby pu bw av 10%, huk mvy aopyk-nlulyhapvu jlwohsvzwvypuz pu 2–3%, vm wlupjpsspu-hsslynpj whapluaz. \u Whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm pttlkphal ofwlyzluzpapcpaf av wlupjpsspu huk vaoly ilah-shjahtz zovbsk uva yljlpcl h jlwohsvzwvypu. Jlwohsvzwvypuz zovbsk il bzlk dpao jhbapvu pu whapluaz dpao zluzpapcpaf av wlupjpsspu huk vaoly ilah-shjahtz.\u T\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua:
Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk—wylzlua pu tpsr pu

hupths

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Wyl-lepzapun zlpgbyl kpzvykly—pujylhzlk ypzr vm zlpgbylz; zbwyh-uvyths jylhapupul jslhyhujl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Zbwyh-uvyths jylhapupul jslhyhujl</o5>     <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz av tlhzbyl ihzlspul yluhs mbujapvu huk pujylhzl kbyhapvu vm pumbzpvu pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl nylhaly aohu 150 tS/tpubal.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

(

Glcalyh

®), npcl pualytpaaluasf pu Nsbjvzl 5%, vy Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9%, vy Shjahalk Ypunly'z zvsbapvu; yljvuzapabal lhjo 500 tn dpao 10 tS Dhaly mvy puqljapvuz vy Nsbjvzl 5%; kpsbal pu 250 tS pumbzpvu msbpk huk npcl vcly 2 ovbyz (pujylhzlk av 4 ovbyz pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl nylhaly aohu 150 tS/tpubal). Kv uva tpe dpao jhsjpbt-jvuahpupun zvsbapvuz (lejlwa Shjahalk Ypunly'z zvsbapvu) pu aol zhtl puayhcluvbz spul—wyljpwpahapvu thf vjjby.

<w>Mhszl wvzpapcl bypuhyf nsbjvzl (pm alzalk mvy ylkbjpun zbizahujlz).</w> <w>Mhszl wvzpapcl Jvvtiz’ alza.</w>
